description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Sharpen your swords and study your spellbooks, great adventure awaits!  Explore multiple dungeon maps, defeating foes to gain treasure and level up your characters.  Many secrets and puzzles await to be discovered.  Attempt to defeat several unique dungeon keepers in challenge mode, or create an unique party of up to 4 characters to solve a centuries old tragedy in the Campaign mode.
